Kitronik_Game_Controller:
Blocks for driving the Kitronik :GAME Controller

Blocks for driving the Kitronik :GAME Controller
Kitronik_Game_Controller.buttonIsPressed: Determines if a :GAME Controller button is pressed
Kitronik_Game_Controller.onButtonPress: Do something when one of the :GAME Controller Buttons is pressed
Kitronik_Game_Controller.onButtonPress|p: happening on the button, eg: click
Kitronik_Game_Controller.runMotor: Run vibration motor for a particular length of time
Kitronik_Game_Controller.runMotor|param|: is the length of time the motor will run in ms, eg: 100
Kitronik_Game_Controller.setBuzzerPin: Setup micro:bit to play music through :GAME Controller buzzer
